tasks.label: Vault Audit
tasks.command: cd C:\Users\execu\agent-zero-Fork && .venv\Scripts\python.exe -u -c "from python.helpers.vault import vault_list, vault_load, vault_audit; secrets = vault_list(); print(f'Total secrets: {len(secrets)}'); print(); print('All encrypted secrets:'); [print(f'  [{i+1}] {s} â€” encrypted: {vault_load(s) is not None}') for i,s in enumerate(sorted(secrets))]; print(); audit = vault_audit(); print(f'Master key exists: {audit[chr(109)+chr(97)+chr(115)+chr(116)+chr(101)+chr(114)+chr(95)+chr(107)+chr(101)+chr(121)+chr(95)+chr(101)+chr(120)+chr(105)+chr(115)+chr(116)+chr(115)]}'); print(f'Env leaks: {audit[chr(101)+chr(110)+chr(118)+chr(95)+chr(108)+chr(101)+chr(97)+chr(107)+chr(115)]}'); print(f'Unvaulted: {audit[chr(117)+chr(110)+chr(118)+chr(97)+chr(117)+chr(108)+chr(116)+chr(101)+chr(100)]}')"

tasks.label: Vault Audit
tasks.command: cd C:\Users\execu\agent-zero-Fork && .venv\Scripts\python.exe -u -c "from python.helpers.vault import vault_list, vault_load, vault_audit; secrets = vault_list(); print(f'Total secrets: {len(secrets)}'); print(); print('All encrypted secrets:'); [print(f'  [{i+1}] {s} -- decryptable: {vault_load(s) is not None}') for i,s in enumerate(sorted(secrets))]; print(); a = vault_audit(); print(f'Master key: {a[\"master_key_exists\"]}'); print(f'Env leaks: {a[\"env_leaks\"]}'); print(f'Unvaulted: {a[\"unvaulted\"]}')"

tasks.label: Git Push to Origin
tasks.command: cd C:\Users\execu\agent-zero-Fork && git push origin main

tasks.label: git-push-main
tasks.command: cd C:\Users\execu\agent-zero-Fork && git push origin main 2>&1
